House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05043
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7160, ALSO KNOWN AS THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE, ON THE LEVEL OF THE POSITION OF SECRETARY TO THE SANGGUNIAN
ABSTRACT : Amends Section 469 of R.A.NO.7160 to read as follows: There shall be a secretary to the Sanggunian who shall be a career official with the rank and salary (equal) of a head of department or office. Places therefore the said position to the level of a local government department head.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GARCIA, GWENDOLYN F.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-14
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
